doc:
"Victor Wong (actor born 1927)" 0 Yee Keung Victor Wong (traditional Chinese: 黃自強; simplified Chinese: 黄自強; pinyin: Huáng Zìqiáng; Jyutping: Wong4 Zi6koeng4; 30 July 1927 – 12 September 2001) was an American character actor of Chinese descent who appeared in supporting roles throughout the 1980s and 1990s. He is widely known for his role as Chinese sorcerer Egg Shen in John Carpenter's 1986 film Big Trouble in Little China. Yee_Keung_Victor_Wong ( traditional_Chinese : 黃自強 ; simplified_Chinese : 黄自強 ; pinyin : Huáng_Zìqiáng ; Jyutping : Wong4 Zi6koeng4 ; 30_July_1927 – 12_September_2001 ) was an_American_character_actor of Chinese_descent who appeared in supporting roles throughout the_1980s_and_1990s . He is_widely_known for his_role as Chinese_sorcerer_Egg_Shen in John_Carpenter 's_1986_film_Big_Trouble in Little_China .
